articles.title: JPMorgan's Jamie Dimon to be deposed in Epstein lawsuits - Financial Times
articles.description: Sworn testimony scheduled to take place behind closed doors in May as bank fights litigation
articles.content: Jamie Dimon, the longtime chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, will be interviewed under oath over his banks decision to retain the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein as a client, said people familiar w… [+3093 chars]

articles.author: Alex Hern
articles.title: Twitter to promote only paying users' tweets, Elon Musk announces - The Guardian
articles.description: From 15 April, ‘For you’ tab that curates popular posts will feature just Twitter Blue subscribers
articles.content:
Twitters feed will promote only the tweets of users paying its £8 monthly subscription service, Elon Musk, the sites owner and chief executive, has tweeted.
